welcome.title: Welcome to the global chat!
welcome.description: If you don't know how this works, messages sent here will be sent to other servers and vice versa.

‚óà Just use common sense and don't violate Discord Terms
‚óà Be disrespectful, float, send **explicit sexual content **/**too suggestive** may cause banishment

fields.name: „Ö§‚ûØ„Ö§ „ÄåWhat you ‚ú® can/cannot ‚ú® do„Äç
fields.value:
**You can:**
‚óà Send/Edit/Delete messages with photos/videos/gifs , emojis, stickers and website links allowed

**But can't:**
‚óà Send server invites
‚óà Edit/delete messages longer than 15 minutes
‚óà Mention everyone/here or users/ roles
‚óà Set this chat as an adult content channel
